title: Samsung wants to boost BlackBerry alliance, not buy it | Trusted Reviews
description: ![BlackBerryPassport]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * The Korean company said it would be [using BlackBerry’s security expertise toboost its own KNOX platform](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/blackberry-to-lend-its-security-expertise-to-samsung-s-android-phones) in order to addenhanced levels of security for users on the firm’s Galaxy-branded handsetsand tablets.What the extension of that partnership may entail remains to be seen, buttoday’s developments certainly seem to confirm BlackBerry won’t be ending up aSamsung-owned company any time soon.
